name: Roy Tang
text: May subscription fee na now. You have to choose when you sign up for the one month free trial. Netflix is really really good at the delivery service (madaming technical articles about how they optimize the bandwidth usage regardless of the number of subscribers), so any bottleneck will be on our ISPs here
